motel.name: Rundown Motel
motel.description: Your temporary home. Cheap but functional.

clinic.name: Outskirts Clinic
clinic.description: A small clinic on the outskirts of the city.

underground.name: Underground Market
underground.description: A hidden market where anything can be found... for a price.

grocery.name: Grocery Store
grocery.description: A modest grocery store in the suburbs.

mall.name: City Mall
mall.description: A bustling shopping center in the city.

restaurant.name: Fine Dining
restaurant.description: An upscale restaurant. Expensive but classy.

gym.name: Fitness Center
gym.description: A well-equipped gym. Membership has its benefits.

bar.name: Night Bar
bar.description: A dimly lit bar. Good for gathering information.

museum.name: City Museum
museum.description: The grand City Museum. Home of the Jade Whip.

police.name: Police Station
police.description: Better stay on your best behavior here.

bank.name: Central Bank
bank.description: Fort Knox has nothing on this place. Chapter 5 content.

Order drink.message: The bartender shares some rumors. -$10, +10 Charisma

Study layout.message: You memorize the museum layout. +5 Knowledge

Talk to guard.add_intel: Security system: Laser grid at night
Talk to guard.message: You chat with a guard and learn about the security. +5 Charisma

Browse goods.message: You buy some... questionable tools. -$15, +15 Criminality

Talk to dealer.message: The dealer shares underworld secrets. +5 Criminality, +5 Knowledge

Check belongings.message: A worn suitcase, some spare clothes, and memories of better days.

Get checkup.message: The doctor checks your vitals. "You're fine. Just stressed. Get some rest."

Buy medicine.message: You browse the shelves. Aspirin, bandages, antacids. Nothing you need right now.

Check job listings.message: "Now Hiring: Minimum wage, maximum effort." The usual dead ends.

Talk to cashier.message: "Paper or plastic?" The cashier barely looks up from their phone.

Shop for clothes.message: You window shop. Nice things for people with nice incomes.

Visit arcade.message: Flashing lights, electronic beeps. You watch a kid set a high score.

Apply for job.message: "We'll call you." The manager's smile doesn't reach their eyes.

Talk to bartender.message: The bartender wipes a glass. "Rough day?" You nod. They understand.

Admire exhibits.message: Ancient pottery, faded paintings, dusty artifacts. History under glass.

Check wanted posters.message: Small-time crooks and petty thieves stare back at you from faded posters.
Check wanted posters.message_after_heist: You see a sketch that looks vaguely like you... unsettling.

Check job board.message: Coded messages, cryptic symbols. Jobs for people with... flexible morals.

intro.speaker: Narrator
intro.text: Another rejection letter. Another door closed.

intro.speaker: Narrator
intro.text: You stare at the cracked ceiling of your motel room, the weight of failure pressing down.

intro.speaker: {player_name}
intro.text: (Thinking) Three months since graduation. Dozens of applications. Zero offers.

intro.speaker: {player_name}
intro.text: (Thinking) My savings are running out. I need to find something... anything.

intro.speaker: Narrator
intro.text: Your phone buzzes. A notification from a job hunting app: "0 new matches."

intro.speaker: Narrator
intro.text: Perhaps exploring the city might turn up some opportunities. Or at least, a distraction.

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: Narrator
clinic_meet_cal.text: You enter the small clinic. The fluorescent lights flicker overhead.

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: Narrator
clinic_meet_cal.text: A cheerful receptionist waves at you from behind the counter.

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: Cal
clinic_meet_cal.text: I'm Cal. What brings you to our little clinic?

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: {player_name}
clinic_meet_cal.text: Just... looking for some medicine. Headaches.

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: Cal
clinic_meet_cal.text: You look like you've had a rough time. New to the city?

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: {player_name}
clinic_meet_cal.text: Yeah. Still trying to find my footing.

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: Cal
clinic_meet_cal.text: The city can be tough. But there are... opportunities, if you know where to look.

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: Cal
clinic_meet_cal.text: There's a basement entrance behind this building. If you're desperate enough.

clinic_meet_cal.speaker: Narrator
clinic_meet_cal.text: Cal's eyes hold a knowing glint. What kind of opportunities?

underground_first.speaker: Narrator
underground_first.text: You descend into the underground market. The air is thick with secrets.

underground_first.speaker: Narrator
underground_first.text: A figure emerges from the shadows, their face obscured.

underground_first.speaker: Shadowy Figure
underground_first.text: Looking for work? The kind that pays... generously?

underground_first.speaker: Shadowy Figure
underground_first.text: The Phantom Thief Association is always looking for talent.

underground_first.speaker: Shadowy Figure
underground_first.text: There's a job coming up. The City Museum. The Jade Whip.

underground_first.speaker: Shadowy Figure
underground_first.text: Worth millions. And you'd get a cut. Interested?

accept_heist.speaker: Shadowy Figure
accept_heist.text: Smart choice. Here's what you need to know.

accept_heist.speaker: Shadowy Figure
accept_heist.text: The Jade Whip is in the east wing of the museum. Heavy security.

accept_heist.speaker: Shadowy Figure
accept_heist.text: You'll need to scout the place first. Learn the guard rotations.

accept_heist.speaker: Shadowy Figure
accept_heist.text: When you're ready, come back here. We'll set a date.

accept_heist.speaker: Narrator
accept_heist.text: You receive a burner phone and a basic disguise kit.

accept_heist.speaker: Narrator
accept_heist.text: Your journey as a phantom thief begins...

museum_scout.speaker: Narrator
museum_scout.text: The City Museum stands before you, grand and imposing.

museum_scout.speaker: Narrator
museum_scout.text: Security guards patrol the entrance. Cameras dot every corner.

museum_scout.speaker: {player_name}
museum_scout.text: (Thinking) I need to learn the layout without raising suspicion.

museum_scout.speaker: Narrator
museum_scout.text: You spot the Jade Whip in a display case in the east wing.

museum_scout.speaker: Narrator
museum_scout.text: It gleams under the spotlights, practically begging to be taken.

inspector_meet.speaker: Narrator
inspector_meet.text: As you study the security, someone approaches.
Fascinating piece, isn't it? The Jade Whip.

inspector_meet.speaker: Narrator
inspector_meet.text: A sharp-eyed individual in a trenchcoat stands beside you.

inspector_meet.speaker: Inspector Mori
inspector_meet.text: I'm Inspector Mori. Phantom Thief Task Force.

inspector_meet.speaker: Inspector Mori
inspector_meet.text: We've been getting reports of suspicious activity around the museum.

inspector_meet.speaker: Inspector Mori
inspector_meet.text: You wouldn't happen to know anything about that, would you?

inspector_meet.speaker: Inspector Mori
inspector_meet.text: Hmm. Well, enjoy your visit. And remember...

inspector_meet.speaker: Inspector Mori
inspector_meet.text: Crime never pays. Not in my city.

inspector_meet.speaker: Narrator
inspector_meet.text: The Inspector walks away, but you feel their eyes on your back.

grocery_visit.speaker: Narrator
grocery_visit.text: The fluorescent lights buzz overhead. A bored cashier scrolls through their phone.

grocery_visit.speaker: {player_name}
grocery_visit.text: (Thinking) Just a regular grocery store. Nothing special here.

grocery_visit.speaker: Narrator
grocery_visit.text: A job listing board catches your eye near the exit. 'Now Hiring - Flexible Hours'

grocery_visit.speaker: {player_name}
grocery_visit.text: (Thinking) Honest work... but would it ever be enough?

mall_visit.speaker: Narrator
mall_visit.text: The city mall buzzes with activity. Shoppers drift between stores, bags in hand.

mall_visit.speaker: {player_name}
mall_visit.text: (Thinking) Everyone here has money to spend. Must be nice.

mall_visit.speaker: Narrator
mall_visit.text: You pass by designer boutiques, their price tags making you wince.

mall_visit.speaker: {player_name}
mall_visit.text: (Thinking) The arcade might be fun. Or I could pick up a book...

restaurant_visit.speaker: Narrator
restaurant_visit.text: Crystal chandeliers. White tablecloths. The clink of expensive silverware.

restaurant_visit.speaker: {player_name}
restaurant_visit.text: (Thinking) This place screams money. Way out of my league.

restaurant_visit.speaker: Narrator
restaurant_visit.text: A waiter glances at your clothes with barely concealed disdain.

restaurant_visit.speaker: {player_name}
restaurant_visit.text: (Thinking) Maybe someday I'll walk in here like I own the place.

gym_visit.speaker: Narrator
gym_visit.text: The smell of sweat and determination fills the air.

gym_visit.speaker: {player_name}
gym_visit.text: (Thinking) Getting stronger couldn't hurt. You never know when you'll need to run.

gym_visit.speaker: Narrator
gym_visit.text: Muscular regulars eye you as you walk past the equipment.

bar_visit.speaker: Narrator
bar_visit.text: Dim lights. Jazz playing softly. The clink of glasses.

bar_visit.speaker: {player_name}
bar_visit.text: (Thinking) This place has atmosphere. People come here to talk... and to listen.

bar_visit.speaker: Narrator
bar_visit.text: The bartender polishes a glass, watching the room with knowing eyes.

bar_visit.speaker: {player_name}
bar_visit.text: (Thinking) Bars are where secrets are traded. Could be useful.

police_visit.speaker: Narrator
police_visit.text: The police station looms before you. Officers bustle about with purpose.

police_visit.speaker: {player_name}
police_visit.text: (Thinking) Why am I here? This feels like a bad idea.

police_visit.speaker: Narrator
police_visit.text: A wanted poster board catches your attention. Petty thieves, mostly.

police_visit.speaker: {player_name}
police_visit.text: (Thinking) I should probably leave before someone gets suspicious.

motel_return.speaker: Narrator
motel_return.text: Back to your temporary home. The familiar creak of the door greets you.

motel_return.speaker: {player_name}
motel_return.text: (Thinking) It's not much, but it's all I've got right now.

infiltration.description: You stand before the museum's service entrance. The heist begins now.
You're inside. Security cameras sweep the hallway ahead.

calling_card.description: The Jade Whip gleams before you. Laser sensors crisscross the display.

escape.description: Alarms blare! Guards are converging on your position!
Inspector Mori blocks your path! "End of the line, thief!"

rejected.title: The Safe Path
rejected.text: You walked away from the underground. Perhaps a normal life awaits... but this isn't that story.

caught.title: Busted!
caught.text: Inspector Mori caught you! "I knew you were suspicious from the start."

starvation.title: Starved
starvation.text: You collapsed from hunger. The phantom thief dream ends here...

health.title: Exhausted
health.text: Your health gave out. Take better care of yourself next time...

chapter1_complete.title: Chapter 1 Complete!
chapter1_complete.text:
Congratulations! You completed Chapter 1.

The Jade Whip is yours, and Inspector Mori is on your trail.

More chapters coming soon...

objectives.start: Explore the city. Find a job or... other opportunities.
objectives.found_underground: You learned about the underground market behind the clinic...
objectives.accepted_heist: Scout the City Museum. Learn its layout and security.
objectives.met_inspector: Return to the underground market when ready for the heist.
